verbose_text: Once reperfusion occurs, the restoration of oxygen delivery paradoxically exacerbates the initial insult through increased activation of enzymes involved in free-radicals production, such as xanthine-oxidase (XO), which in the presence of oxygen catalyzes the conversion of hypoxanthine to xanthine and simultaneously generates superoxide XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: xanthine-oxidase (XO), which in the presence of oxygen catalyzes the conversion of hypoxanthine to xanthine
